question: How does the Sat2Farm app work?
answer:
Sat2Farm uses satellite data and AI to give you farm-specific insights. Add your farm by
geo-tagging, select your crop, and receive updates on soil health, irrigation, weather,
pest/disease risks, and more.

question: Is there a demo for this app?
answer:
Yes! Watch our demo video here: https://youtu.be/DgiBr4AdBv0
Explore the demo farm inside the app to understand features before subscribing.

question: I’m new here. How do I start using the app?
answer:
Welcome! Start by adding your farm using the "Add Farm" feature. Then select your crop
and sowing date. You'll begin receiving tailored scientific insights. Need help? Ask anytime!

question: What languages does the app support?
answer:
Currently available in English, Hindi, Kannada, Telugu, and more. Language can be
selected from the profile section.
Adding a Farm

question: How to add my farm in the app?
answer:
Go to Home → Tap "Add New" → Choose Walk or Draw method → Mark the boundary →
Fill in farm name, crop, sowing date → Save. Your farm will be listed under "My Farms".

question: I walked around my farm but it shows 0.0 acres?
answer:
Ensure your GPS/location is on, walk slowly around the full boundary, and avoid standing
still for long. Try redrawing if the issue persists.

question: Can I add multiple farms?
answer:
Yes! You can add as many farms as needed. Each will have a unique Farm ID for
tracking.

question: Can I delete or edit a farm?
answer:
Yes you can delete a farm and you edit farm details such as Sowing date and crop only.
But the farm name and coordinates can’t be edited. Contact support with your Farm ID for
any specific queries.
Crop Health / NDVI

question: How do I check NDVI for farming health?
answer:
Go to "My Farms" → Select your farm → Tap "Crop Health". You’ll see the NDVI map with
color zones (Red = Poor, Green = Healthy).

question: How do I check NDVI for agriculture health?
answer:
Go to "My Farms" → Select your farm → Tap "Crop Health". You’ll see the NDVI map with
color zones (Red = Poor, Green = Healthy).

question: How do I check NDVI for crop health?
answer:
Go to "My Farms" → Select your farm → Tap "Crop Health". You’ll see the NDVI map with
color zones (Red = Poor, Green = Healthy).

question: Why is agriculture health not updating?
answer:
NDVI updates every 5 days. If cloudy, data might be skipped. Check the next update date
in the same section.

question: Why is farming health not updating?
answer:
NDVI updates every 5 days. If cloudy, data might be skipped. Check the next update date
in the same section.

question: Why is crop health not updating?
answer:
NDVI updates every 5 days. If cloudy, data might be skipped. Check the next update date
in the same section.

question: How to understand the NDVI chart?
answer:
NDVI chart shows crop health trends over time. Higher curve = better vegetation.
Compare weekly values to track crop progress.
Soil Health & Moisture

question: How do I get a soil health report?
answer:
After adding your farm and selecting the crop, tap "Soil Health". You’ll see macronutrients
(N, P, K), pH, and organic carbon. Report is downloadable as PDF.

question: How is soil health measured by satellite?
answer:
It’s estimated using satellite spectral bands + AI models trained on lab data. This gives
non-invasive, cost-effective insights.

question: Why is my soil moisture data old?
answer:
Soil moisture updates every 12 days. If recent data is missing, it may be due to satellite
schedule or cloud/rain interference.

question: LSWI is low even after irrigation. Why?
answer:
LSWI may take 1-3 days to reflect changes. Factors like soil type or cloudy weather may
delay visible updates.
Weather Forecast

question: How to view the weather forecast?
answer:
In "My Farms", select your farm → Tap "Weather" → View 14-day forecast for
temperature, rainfall, wind, and cloud cover graphically.

question: Why is the forecast not updating?
answer: Refresh the app or check the internet. Forecast updates every 3 hours.

question: Can I get rainfall data in mm?
answer: Yes. Under the Rainfall tab, mm values are shown per day. Pinch to zoom for details.

question: Does it predict the monsoon accurately?
answer:
It’s ~80% accurate for the next 3 days; monsoon can change quickly. Use local
knowledge as a supplement.

question: How to get irrigation recommendations?
answer:
Tap "Irrigation" → See amount (mm) and frequency for surface, sprinkler, and drip based
on your crop stage and soil moisture.

question: Why is the irrigation section not working?
answer:
Data may be processed. Wait up to 4 hours after adding farm or contact support if
persists.

question: What do mm values mean?
answer: Millimeters of water per acre needed to reach optimal moisture.

question: Can I follow the schedule for drip irrigation?
answer:
Yes. In irrigation advisory, follow the "Drip" method for specific guidance.
Crop Calendar

question: What is the Crop Calendar?
answer: A weekly timeline of farm activities from field prep to harvest, tailored to your sowing date.

question: How to retrieve it?
answer:
Tap "Crop Calendar" in your farm menu. Scroll weeks to see tasks and input
recommendations.

question: How to get it?
answer:
Tap "Crop Calendar" in your farm menu. Scroll weeks to see tasks and input
recommendations.

question: How to access it?
answer:
Tap "Crop Calendar" in your farm menu. Scroll weeks to see tasks and input
recommendations.

question: How to open it?
answer:
Tap "Crop Calendar" in your farm menu. Scroll weeks to see tasks and input
recommendations.

question: Does it cover pest control?
answer:
Yes, in specific cases it flags spraying windows for pesticides and organic options.
Otherwise, covered in pest and disease forewarning.
Pest & Disease Forewarning

question: How do I get pest and disease alerts?
answer:
Open "Pest & Disease Forewarning" → View upcoming risk dates, symptom details, and
control measures.

question: What factors trigger alerts?
answer: Weather parameters: temperature, humidity, rainfall.

question: How accurate are these warnings?
answer: ~85% based on historical data and weather.

question: Can I request specific disease info?
answer:
Yes. Use "Community" or "Image Advisory" to ask experts.
Image Advisory

question: How to upload farming photos?
answer:
Tap "Image Advisory" → Camera icon → Take or select more than 3 clear images → Add
comments → Submit.

question: How to upload agriculture photos?
answer:
Tap "Image Advisory" → Camera icon → Take or select more than 3 clear images → Add
comments → Submit.

question: How to upload crop photos?
answer:
Tap "Image Advisory" → Camera icon → Take or select more than 3 clear images → Add
comments → Submit.

question: How long for diagnosis?
answer: 3-4 hours (working hours).

question: No reply after 2 days. What now?
answer: Re-upload images with timestamp or contact support with Farm ID.

question: Can I get organic solutions?
answer:
Yes, we also provide organic solutions based on requirements. Contact support for more
information.
Trial & Pricing

question: Can I get a trial?
answer: We offer a demo farm, but no free trial. Subscribe at ₹800/acre/season for full access.

question: Any offer for new farmers?
answer: Contact sales at contact@satyukt.com.

question: Why no freemium?
answer: Premium services support real-time updates and expert advisory.

question: Can I pay per region currency?
answer:
Currently INR only via Razorpay. Local currency support is in development.
Payment & Unlock

question: Payment done but farm not unlocked?
answer: Sync delay up to 2 hours. If still locked, share Farm ID to support@satyukt.com.

question: How to pay?
answer: In-app via Razorpay. Go to Farm → Lock icon → Pay.

question: Is each farm charged separately?
answer: Yes. ₹800 per acre per season per farm.

question: Can I update the referral code?
answer:
Only once after signup. Contact support if you missed it.
Troubleshooting

question: Data not loading?
answer: Check the internet. Switch between Wi-Fi & mobile data.

question: Farm deleted automatically?
answer: Rare issue. Contact support with Farm ID & timestamp.

question: Multiple farms with the same name error?
answer:
Rare issue. Contact support to merge them into a single record..
Community & Support

question: How to contact you?
answer: Call +91-8970095700, email contact@satyukt.com, or use the Community page in-app.

question: How to use a Community page?
answer: Tap Community → + icon → Enter your question → Submit. Experts reply in 24 hrs.

question: Can I share farms with others?
answer: Yes. In My Farms → ••• menu → Share → Enter mobile number.

question: Do you call for clarifications?
answer:
Yes, experts may call if more details are needed.
Language Support

question: Can I switch app language?
answer: Tap menu → Switch Language → Choose from available options.

question: Are advisories translated?
answer: Advisories are in English & major languages based on crop support.

question: Need Hindi replies?
answer: Use a Community page in Hindi; our team responds in kind.

question: How to add a new language?
answer:
Contact support to request for your language.
Data Accuracy

question: What is the accuracy of soil moisture?
How accurate is the weather forecast?
answer: ~90% for next 3 days; drops in monsoon.

question: Soil health accuracy?
answer: ~85-90%, varies by region & crop.

question: NDVI accuracy?
answer:
Optical measure; reliable within 5-day window when clear.
Advanced

question: Can I analyze terrace gardens?
answer: Soil moisture & NDVI need more than 30m × 30m. Smaller gardens not supported.

question: Can I get NPK for a terrace garden?
answer: No, soil health requires more than ¼ acre.

question: Thick plantations (banana, coconut)?
answer: Weather & NDVI supported; soil health & moisture less accurate under canopy.

question: Insurance integration?
answer:
We offer an API (Sat4Risk) for insurers to integrate.
Historical Data

question: Can I open last year’s data?
answer: Yes, request historical export (paid). Not directly in-app.

question: Can I get last year’s data?
answer: Yes, request historical export (paid). Not directly in-app.

question: Can I retrieve last year’s data?
answer: Yes, request historical export (paid). Not directly in-app.

question: Can I access last year’s data?
answer: Yes, request historical export (paid). Not directly in-app.

question: How old is satellite data used?
answer: Up to 6 months for barren land analysis.

question: Can I backfill KML farms?
answer:
We can import KML for paid customers-contact support.
Carbon & Sustainability

question: Carbon emissions for rice fields?

question: How to get carbon credits?

We estimate emissions; contact support for more information.

Specialized Crops

question: Horticulture agricultures (onion, papaya)?

question: Horticulture crops (onion, papaya)?

question: Terrace garden?
answer:
Minimum area rule applies; small patches not supported.
